name: A Wizard's Cloak
description:
This is a small project that I worked on for the VimJam 2 Game jam 2021. 

I have made all the assets; including Music, sprites, and sound effects.

I have used Game Maker studio 2 to develop this project.

Btw this is my second game jam!!

Sadly the graphics are not so good in the browser, you can download for nicer graphics.
